snippet: Dries Mertens scored four goals, including a nine-minute first-half hat-trick, as Napoli forgot their scoring problems with a 5-3 win over Torino in Serie A on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Dries Mertens scored four goals, including a nine-minute first-half hat-trick, as Napoli forgot their scoring problems with a 5-3 win over Torino in Serie A on Sunday.

headline.main: Mertens Hits Four as Napoli Win Eight-Goal Thriller
headline.print_headline: Mertens Hits Four as Napoli Win Eight-Goal Thriller
